venue.title: Cinnabar Hertford
venue.content: Our Hertford venue is a vibrant and dynamic cocktail bar located in the heart of Fore street. Boasting bespoke cocktails, brunches packed full of good vibes and late night events collaborating with some of the best UK brands. The space is available for full venue and part venue hire. Perfect for all celebrations.

waitlist_reminders.message: Your table will be ready in approx 10 minutes. To get an update reply with UPDATE. To cancel reply with REMOVE.
Your table will be ready shortly. Please head back to the venue/see the host. To cancel reply with REMOVE.
Your table is being prepared. Please head back to the venue/see the host. To cancel reply with REMOVE.

venue.reminder_email_contents:
Dear Guest,

We look forward to seeing you tomorrow for your booking.

If you require any further assistance before you join us do not hesitate to get in touch.

King Regards,

Cinnabar Hertford
venue.follow_up_email_contents:
Dear Guest,


Thank you for visiting!

We do hope that you had a memorable visit with us.

We are constantly striving to improve our customer experience and it would be extremely useful to us if you could send us some feedback via the link below:

Cinnabar Feedback Form 

You will be enetered into our monthly prize draw.

We look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.


Kind Regards,

Cinnabar Team

preorder_reminders.message:
Dear Guest,

A kind reminder that we require your pre-order 48 hours prior to your booking. For any further information please contact us on 01992660660 or email us on hertford@cinnabarvenues.co.uk

We look forward to having you with us.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar team

Dear Guest,

booking_types.name: EUROS 2024 DRINKS BOOKING
booking_types.confirmation_email_message:
Thank you for your Drinks booking. Were looking forward to having you join us.

A polite notice that Cinnabar operates as a 18+ venue after 19:00 

Tables will be released after 15 minutes from your booking time. In the circumstance that you're running late please contact us.

On weekends and special events we also operate with a no I.D. no entry policy and door charges may apply. Visit our website for more information.

If you require any further assistance please dont hesitate to contact us.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team
booking_types.acknowledgement_email_message:
Thank you for your enquiry.

A member of our booking team will be in touch with you shortly.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team
booking_types.cancellation_email_message:
We are sorry that your booking has now been cancelled. Thank you for considering us and we hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you in the future. If this cancellation has been done in error or you would like to rebook please contact us.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar team

booking_types.name: Happy Hour 241 Cocktails (Fri-Sat 6pm-9pm)
booking_types.confirmation_email_message:
Thank you for your Drinks booking. Were looking forward to having you join us.

A polite notice that Cinnabar operates as a 18+ venue on Friday's & over 20's on Saturday.

Tables will be released after 15 minutes from your booking time. In the circumstance that you're running late please contact us.

After your allocated booking we will need the table back if the table has been booked again, we will however try to accommodate as best as we can for those who would like to stay longer. Please contact us or speak to the management team on the night to discuss options. Door charges may apply.

On weekends and special events we also operate with a no I.D. no entry policy from 22:00 and door charges may apply. Visit our website for more information.

 Our dress code: Smart, Sexy, Smart Casual - no hats, no hoods, no sportswear, no manbags/sidebags, no flip flops, box fresh trainers only.

If you require any further assistance please dont hesitate to contact us.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team

Kind regards,

Cinnabar team

monday.booking_notes: For all private hire enquiries we will do our absolute best to get back to you as quick as possible. For urgent requests please call us on 01992660660.

booking_types.confirmation_email_message:
Thank you for choosing to hold your event at Cinnabar Hertford. Your booking is now confirmed and we look forward to hosting you soon, if you have any questions please feel free to email us or call.

Please note our T's&C's below:

All private hires are over 18's after 10pm unless authorised by management. 

All hire fee's are required to be paid before your booking is confirmed. 

Any cancellation must be made 10 working days prior to the event date, failure to do so will result in a loss of the hire fee. 

All guests of any private hires/functions will be subject to door fee's when applicable. (We always recommend advising guests to arrive early.)

All guests must be aligned with Cinnabar's dress code. Management reserve the right to refuse entry to anyone on the door. This include guests for private hires/functions.

Our dress code policy is available on our website.

For buffet options please email or contact us to enquire.

External catering can be arranged but must be authorised by Management prior.

No external drinks are allowed on premises. Any drinks brought in and opened could result in the hire being terminated and a loss of the hire fee.

No decorations to be added to any walls or furniture (any damage will be recharged to party booker)

Door charges are charged for anyone entering the building after 10pm 

For any further enquiries please feel free to email/contact us regarding your hire.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team
booking_types.acknowledgement_email_message:
Thank you for your enquiry. 

A member of our bookings team will be in touch within 48 hours 

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team
booking_types.cancellation_email_message:

Kind regards,

Cinnabar team

booking_types.name: Book An Area

thursday.booking_notes:
For larger bookings. Allocated areas may not come with seating.                                                                                                                                              All bookings have limited time slots. Please be aware that your table will be forfeited if you are over 15 minutes late for your booking with no confirmed time change.                                                                                                
After your allocated booking we will need the table back if the table has been booked again, we will however try to accommodate as best as we can for those who would like to stay longer. Please contact us or speak to the management team on the night to discuss options.

booking_types.name: Cocktail Masterclass (Fridays & Saturdays from 6pm)

friday.booking_notes: Shake things up and book in a personalised cocktail masterclass with our amazing cocktail bartenders. Learn to make 3 cocktails in a fun and interactive session with your friends.. and the best thing is you drink everything you make. Must be 18+. (For groups larger than 20 please make an enquiry and we'll get back to you as soon as we can).

saturday.booking_notes: Shake things up and book in a personalised cocktail masterclass with our amazing cocktail bartenders. Learn to make 3 cocktails in a fun and interactive session with your friends.. and the best thing is you drink everything you make. Must be 18+. (For groups larger than 20 please make an enquiry and we'll get back to you as soon as we can).

booking_types.name: Cinnabar Birthdays (Fridays 9-11pm)

friday.booking_notes:
Celebrate your birthday with Cinnabar with a complimentary Birthday Package. Packages are inclusive of a bottle of Prosecco, a round of Tequila Rose Shots and Birthday treat. For larger bookings. Allocated areas may not come with seating. All bookings have limited time slots. Please be aware that your table will be forfeited if you are over 15 minutes late for your booking with no confirmed time change.                                                                                                
After your allocated booking we will need the table back if the table has been booked again, we will however try to accommodate as best as we can for those who would like to stay longer. Please contact us or speak to the management team on the night to discuss options. Door charges may apply.

booking_types.confirmation_email_message:
Thank you for your booking your Birthday with Cinnabar Hertford. Were looking forward to having you join us.

The reserved area will be released for resale if you fail to arrive after 20 minutes of your booking time. We are an over 18's venue on Fridays and over 20's venue on Saturdays that operates a challenge 25 at all venues and a no I.D. no entry policy. For more information please see our website.

After your allocated booking we will need the table back if the table has been booked again, we will however try to accommodate as best as we can for those who would like to stay longer. Please contact us or speak to the management team on the night to discuss options. Door charges may apply. 

Our dress code: Smart, Sexy, Smart Casual - no hats, no hoods, no sportswear, no manbags/sidebags, no flip flops, box fresh trainers only.

If you require any further assistance please dont hesitate to contact us.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team
booking_types.acknowledgement_email_message:
Thank you for your enquiry. We have limited Birthday Packages available per date. A member of our team will be back with you shortly to confirm your booking.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team
booking_types.cancellation_email_message:
We are sorry to hear about your cancellation. We hope to have you join us soon.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team

booking_types.name: VIP TABLE UP TO 6 PEOPLE 350 (DOWNSTAIRS)

friday.booking_notes:
Cinnabar VIP Bookings require a 100 Deposit. Entry fee's are still required to be paid by all guests on VIP tables.

This booking comes with a 50 Table fee & a 300 minimum bottle spend (to be spent exclusively on our bottle menu). Your deposit will be redeemed towards this resulting in the remainder to be paid on arrival to your table.

The reserved area will be released for resale if you fail to arrive after 20 minutes of your booking time. We are an over 18's venue on Fridays and over 20's venue on Saturdays that operates a challenge 25 at all venues and a no I.D. no entry policy. For more information please see our website.

Our dress code: Smart, Sexy, Smart Casual - no hats, no hoods, no sportswear, no manbags/sidebags, no flip flops, box fresh trainers only.

Management reserve the right to refuse anyone on the door under discretion.

Management reserve the right to refuse anyone on the door under discretion.

A member of our team will be with you shortly.

Please note Cinnabar operates as a 20+ venue and with a no I.D. no entry policy (all I.D. will be processed via our Scannet system).

A 100 deposit is required to confirm your booking and entry fee's are still applicable to all table bookings.

The booking type you've requested comes with a 50 Table fee & 300 minimum spend.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team

booking_types.name: Christmas Drinks Booking

booking_overrides.booking_notes: Please be aware that your table will be forfeited if you are over 15 minutes late for your booking (please contact us if you are running late as we'll hold this for you). After your allocated booking time we will need the table back if the table has been booked again, we will however try to accommodate as best as we can for those who would like to stay longer. Please contact us or speak to the management team on the night to discuss options. Door charges may apply. Please note a 5 per person authentication is required for this booking as it's during a peak time of year for us (this will only be charged if there's a cancellation outside of our policy *5 working days before the event*).

booking_types.confirmation_email_message:
Thank you for choosing to hold your event at Cinnabar Hertford. Your booking is now confirmed and we look forward to hosting you soon, if you have any questions please feel free to call David our events manager on 01992 660 660.

Booking Policy.

We will require a card authentication to confirm the booking which will be sent shortly. Any cancellation must be made 10 days prior to the event date, failure to do so or not showing up for the booking will incur a full charge of the card authentication amount. Please note that we run an over 18's policy in our venue after 8pm. For drinks packages, food offerings, entertainment or any questions please call 01992 660 660 to speak to our team about entertainment on the night.

booking_types.name: Christmas Private Hire

monday.booking_notes: For all private hire enquiries we will do our absolute best to get back to you as quick as possible. For urgent requests please call us on 01992660660.

booking_types.confirmation_email_message:
Thank you for choosing to hold your event at Cinnabar Hertford. Your booking is now confirmed and we look forward to hosting you soon, if you have any questions please feel free to email us or call.

Please note our T's&C's below:

All private hires are over 18's unless authorised by management. 

All hire fee's are required to be paid before your booking is confirmed. 

Any cancellation must be made 10 working days prior to the event date, failure to do so will result in a loss of the hire fee. 

All guests of any private hires/functions will be subject to door fee's when applicable. (We always recommend advising guests to arrive early.)

All guests must be aligned with Cinnabar's dress code. Management reserve the right to refuse entry to anyone on the door. This include guests for private hires/functions.

Our dress code policy is available on our website.

For buffet options please email or contact us to enquire.

External catering can be arranged but must be authorised by Management prior.

No external drinks are allowed on premises. Any drinks brought in and opened could result in the hire being terminated and a loss of the hire fee.

No decorations to be added to any walls or furniture (any damage will be recharged to party booker)

Any minimum spends not met will see the remaining balance charged to the hire fee card.

Door charges are charged for anyone entering the building after 10pm 

For any further enquiries please feel free to email/contact us regarding your hire.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team
booking_types.acknowledgement_email_message:
Thank you for your enquiry. 

A member of our bookings team will be in touch within 48 hours 

Kind regards,

Cinnabar Team

booking_types.name: Valentines

booking_overrides.booking_notes: Bespoke and Classic Cocktails made to your liking in our Cocktail Lounge. All bookings have limited time slots. Please be aware that your table will be forfeited if you are over 15 minutes late for your booking with no confirmed time change.                                                                                                After your allocated booking we will need the table back if the table has been booked again, we will however try to accommodate as best as we can for those who would like to stay longer. Please contact us or speak to the management team on the night to discuss options. Door charges may apply.   Our dress code: Smart, Sexy, Smart Casual - no hats, no hoods, no sportswear, no manbags/sidebags, no flip flops, box fresh trainers only.

booking_types.name: VIP table
booking_types.confirmation_email_message:
Thank you for your booking.

Cinnabar VIP Bookings require a 100 Deposit. Entry fee's are still required to be paid by all guests on VIP tables.

This booking comes with a minimum spend. Your deposit will be redeemed towards this resulting in the remainder to be paid on arrival to your table.

The reserved area will be released for resale if you fail to arrive after 20 minutes of your booking time. We are an over 18's venue on Fridays and over 20's venue on Saturdays that operates a challenge 25 at all venues and a no I.D. no entry policy. For more information please see our website.

Our dress code: Smart, Sexy, Smart Casual - no hats, no hoods, no sportswear, no manbags/sidebags, no flip flops, box fresh trainers only.

Management reserve the right to refuse anyone on the door under discretion.

We are sorry that your booking has now been cancelled. Thank you for considering us and we hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you in the future. If this cancellation has been done in error or you would like to rebook please contact us.

Kind regards,

Cinnabar team

booking_types.name: Cocktail Menu Launch Event

booking_overrides.booking_notes: EVENT ENTRY FROM 6PM. Due to us having such a high volume of booking for the event we do not always have time to read guest notes placed in the bookings. If you do have a request please send an email to us when booking or feel free to give us a call. Please be aware that we cannot have under 18s in the premises after 9pm due to our late license conditions. Please direct any queries to hitchin@cinnabar.co.uk or contact us through the booking system by replying to your coformation email. Thank you for choosing Cinnabar.

booking_types.confirmation_email_message:
You're all booked in!

If you have any special requests please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate them.

Kind Regards,

Cinnabar Team
booking_types.acknowledgement_email_message:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for being a part of our Cocktail Menu Launch Event.

A member of our booking team will book you in.

Kind Regards,

Cinnabar Team
